name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.datanode.fsdatasetasyncdisk.max.threads.per.volume
description:
The maximum number of threads per volume used to process async disk
    operations on the datanode. These threads consume I/O and CPU at the
    same time. This will affect normal data node operations.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.client.max-retries
description:
The number of client retries to the RM/HS before
    throwing exception. This is a layer above the ipc.

name: ipc.client.connect.max.retries
description:
Indicates the number of retries a client will make to establish
               a server connection.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.move.thread-count
description: The number of threads used to move files.

name: mapreduce.jobhistory.jobname.limit
description: Number of characters allowed for job name in Job History Server web page.

name: dfs.namenode.edit.log.autoroll.check.interval.ms
description:
How often an active namenode will check if it needs to roll its edit log,
    in milliseconds.
